items.text: length outside off, pushed to cover. Mashrafe is quite animated out there, letting his fielders know exactly what he thinks of the lapses so far
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Guptill, no run

items.text: length on off, hint of movement away, held up in the pitch as well, defended late
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Guptill, no run

items.text: length on middle, Guptill picks it aerially towards fine-leg  but it doesn't carry and the fielder keeps it down to one
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Guptill, 1 run

items.text: length on middle, Nicholls rocks back and turns it around to deep squareleg's right for two
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Nicholls, 2 runs

items.text: full on off, Guptill hammers it straight to mid-off
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Guptill, no run

items.text: full on middle, Guptill turns the face too soon and gets a leading edge that spoons up towards mid-off but lands safely
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Guptill, 1 run

items.text: length on middle, Nicholls rocks back to pull again but is too early into the shot and gets an edge back onto his body
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Nicholls, no run

items.text: length on the pads, Nicholls misses the flick and is struck on the thigh pad
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Nicholls, no run

items.text: slower ball, full on off, defended with a dead bat
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Nicholls, no run

items.text: slower ball on off, defended back to the bowler
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Nicholls, no run

items.text: length on middle, defended back to the bowler
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Guptill, no run

items.text: full on middle, Guptill lunges forward to drive, gets a thick inside edge to midwicket as he is early into the stroke
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Guptill, no run

items.text: length outside off, punched to point
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Guptill, no run

items.text: length on middle, pushed to midwicket's right for one
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Guptill, 1 run

items.text: length outside off, pushed to mid-off
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Nicholls, no run

items.text: length outside off, and out comes the cut shot, delicately late, almost as though against a spinner, past point and into the boundary
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Nicholls, FOUR runs
Mohammad Saifuddin to Guptill, no run

items.text: length on middle, defended
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Guptill, no run

items.preText: Martin Ryder: "Can anyone confirm if anyone has ever scored three consecutive ODI hundreds? Heck, even three at First Class level in the short form. " Sangakkara leads the way with four in ODIs
items.text: full on off, hint of curve away and nearly a leading edge that carries to the bowler as Guptill looks to turn the face and plays too early
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Guptill, no run

items.text: yorker outside off, bit of swing again, jams his bat down on it and they scamper a single
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Guptill, 1 run

items.text: full on the pads, clipped to deep midwicket
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Nicholls, 1 run

items.text: taken brilliantly at long-on and Guptill won't be the first from his country to get three hundreds in a bilateral series. It was full on off, Guptill picked him up down the ground, perhaps meant to go slightly straighter, but the fielder judged it beautifully, first taking it and then as he overbalanced, had the presence of mind to toss it up back into play and catch it again while he was in the air, before coming back into playing area
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Guptill, OUT

dismissal.text: MJ Guptill c Tamim Iqbal b Mohammad Saifuddin 29 (51m 40b 3x4 1x6) SR: 72.50

items.text: length on middle, clipped to squareleg
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Nicholls, 1 run

items.text: full outside off, defended to cover
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Taylor, no run

items.text: full on off, defended to cover
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Taylor, no run
